product.longDescription: Double red leaves with a very defined, three-dimensional shape. Sweet, almost romaine-like flavor, with a crisp, almost iceberg-like texture. Large, heavy heads are slow to bolt. Suitable for mechanical harvesting. High resistance to downy mildew races EU 16–30, 32, 33, US 5–9 and Nasonovia ribisnigri aphid. Pelleted seed. Avg. 780 seeds/oz. Packet: 25 seeds.
product.shortDescription: Exclusive! Sweet flavor and crunchy, crisp, succulent leaves. Conventional seed with NOP-compliant pelleting.

  • Product Notes: <span style="" >Many (though not all) of our pelleted lettuce varieties are primed to increase germination uniformity, and to break thermal and/or light dormancy. However, the priming process decreases the storage life of the seed, so pelleted seed must be kept cool and dry prior to planting, and should be used within one year of purchase.</span>
